    • newBuilder

      public ArmoredElytraBuilder.IStep0 newBuilder(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity player)
      Creates a new builder for an armored elytra.
      Returns:
      The first step of the new builder.

    • repair

      @Nullable public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack repair(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytra, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack repairItems, @Nullable String name)
      Shortcut for repairing an armored elytra.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that is repairing the armored elytra.
      armoredElytra - The armored elytra to repair.
      repairItems - The repair item(s) to use for repairing the armored elytra. It is assumed that they are of the correct type.
      name - The new name of the output armored elytra. When this is null, ArmoredElytra.getArmoredElytraName(ArmorTier) is used to set the name.
      Returns:
      The new armored elytra.

    • enchant

      @Nullable public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack enchant(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytra, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack sourceItem, @Nullable String name)
      Shortcut for enchanting an armored elytra.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that is enchanting the armored elytra.
      armoredElytra - The armored elytra to repair.
      sourceItem - The source item from which to copy the enchantments from.
      name - The new name of the output armored elytra. When this is null, ArmoredElytra.getArmoredElytraName(ArmorTier) is used to set the name.
      Returns:
      The new armored elytra.

    • handleInput

      @Nullable public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack handleInput(org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity player, ElytraInput input)
      Shortcut for handling elytra input.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that provided the input.
      input - The input to process.
      Returns:
      The new armored elytra.

    • combine

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack combine(@Nullable org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack elytra, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack combiner, ArmorTier armorTier, @Nullable String name)
      Shortcut for creating a new armored elytra from two items.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that is combining the items.
      elytra - The input item. This should be an (armored) elytra.
      combiner - The item to combine with the elytra. This should either be an armored elytra of the same non-NONE tier as the input elytra or a chest plate.
      armorTier - The armor tier of the input item. If this is not known, use combine(HumanEntity, ItemStack, ItemStack, String) instead.
      name - The new name of the output armored elytra. When this is null, ArmoredElytra.getArmoredElytraName(ArmorTier) is used to set the name.
      Returns:
      The new armored elytra.

    • combine

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack combine(@Nullable org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack elytra, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack combiner, @Nullable String name)
      See combine(HumanEntity, ItemStack, ItemStack, ArmorTier, String) for unknown armor tiers.

    • newArmoredElytra

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack newArmoredElytra(@Nullable org.bukkit.entity.HumanEntity player, ArmorTier armorTier)
      Creates a new armored elytra of a specific tier.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that is creating the new armored elytra.
      armorTier - The tier of the new armored elytra.
      Returns:
      The new armored elytra.
